blocked.pass: %warning%切勿把你的密碼分享給任何人,分享密碼有可能導致封禁.
blocked.toofast: %warning%LegionPE 不是一個打字比賽的地方,打字打慢點吧!
blocked.toofreq: %warning%不要嘗試去主宰我們的對話屏幕!
blocked.tooshort: %warning%你的每一個字都會在別人的屏幕上佔用一行,難道你認為你不是在浪費着他們的屏幕空間嗎? %em%不要刷屏.

swear.warn: %warning%這個字 %em%%word%%warning% 被偵測出為非法!

noperm.normal: %error%你沒有權限去使用這個指令.
noperm.donate: %error%曾捐款的玩家才能使用這個指令.

absplayer.named: %error%T那個玩家 player "%player%" 不在線或不存在.

error.donator: %warning%請先把你的帳號升級至 Donator 才能使用這個指令.
error.vip: %warning%請先把你的帳號升級至 VIP 才可以使用這指令.
error.staff: %warning%只有管理員才能使用這個指令.
error.notfound: %error%Player %em%%name%%error% not found! Please type the %em2%full%error% (but upper/lower case doesn't matter) name of the player.

alt.warning: %warning%Are you sure to teleport to another server? %notify%Do /alt again to confirm.
alt.success: %success%You are going to be transferred to %em%%ip%:%port%
alt.wait: %error%No alternate server available! Please wait for a few seconds and try again.

view.local: %success%You are currently talking to %em%players on this local server%success%.
view.team: %success%You are currently talking to %em%members of your team%success%.
view.other: %success%You are currently talking to '%em%subscribers of the %em2%'%chan%'%em% channel%success%'.

subto.none: %success%You are currently not subscribing to any channels.

set.local: %success%You are now talking to %em%players on this local server%success%.
set.team: %success%You are now talking to %em%members of your team%success%.
set.other: %success%You are now talking to '%em%subscribers of the %em2%'%chan%'%em% channel%success%'.

request.alreadysent: %error%You have already sent a %req% request to %target%.
request.acceptraise:
%success%You are now %cur% with %target%.
%success%You have sent a %req% request to %target%.
request.raise: %success%You have changed the request to %target% into a %req% request.
request.reduce: %success%You have reduced the request to %target% into a %req% request.
request.rejectsend:
%success%You have rejected the request from %target%.
%success%You have sent a %req% request to %target%.
request.rejectreduce:
%success%You have rejected the request from %target%.
%success%You have set %target% as %cur%.
request.cancelreduce:
%success%You have cancelled the request to %target%.
%success%You have set %target% as %cur%.

friend.self: %error%You can't sent a friend request to yourself!
friend.propaganda: %notify%Friend/enemy status/request between you and %em%%src%%notify% has been updated. Type %em2%/fl%notify% to check.

check.true: %info%Friendly Fire is %em%Activated%info%. Do %em2%/ffa off%info% to turn off.
check.false: %info%Friendly Fire is %em%Not Activated%info%. Do %em2%/ffa on%info% to turn on.

set.true: %info%Friendly Fire has been activated. Do %em2%/ffa off%info% to turn off.
set.false: %info%Friendly Fire has been deactivated. Do %em2%/ffa on%info% to turn on.

gc.cannotstart: %error%You need to wait for %time% more before you can start coin grinding again!
gc.reqconfirm:
%info%The coins you receive in the coming %length% will be multiplied by %amplitude% times.
%notify%Execute this command again to activate coins grinding.
gc.advice: %warning%Note: The advised alias for this command is %em%/cg.

lbl.view: %success%You are using/attempting to use tag %em%%label%%success%, which is %em2%%state%
lbl.approving: %error%The desired label is still awaiting for approval from admins.

pm.remindquery: %notify%Reminder: Use /q next time if you want to %em%talk in chat directly%notify% instead of %em2%typing /w every time%notify%.

pn.recipient:
%notify%You have received a private notice from a staff member:
%msg%

create.invalidname: %error%The team name has to be %em%at least 5 characters long%error%, with %em2%all%error% characters being %em2%alphabets, numbers, hyphens (-) or underscores (_)%error%!
create.alreadyexists: %error%A team of this name already exists!

team.loading: %wait%Please wait patiently while we are processing your request.

join.alreadysent: %error%You have already sent a join request to Team %em%%teamname%.
join.accepted: %success%You have accepted the join invitation from Team %em%%teamname%!
join.requested: %info%A join request has been sent to Team %em%%teamname%.

warning.junior: %warning%Are you sure to quit your team? The team points you earned for your team will be %error%deleted%warning%! If your team is closed, you need to be %em2%invited again%warning% to join back the team!
warning.normal:
%warning%Are you sure to quit your team? The team points you earned for your team will be %error%deleted%warning%! You will become a %em%Junior-Member%warning% when you join the team again!
%verbose%If your team is closed, you need to be %em2%invited again%verbosemid% to join back the team!
warning.leader: %warning%Are you sure to quit your team? The team points you earned for your team will be %error%deleted%warning%! As the %em%leader%warning% of your team, you will disband the whole team (%em2%deleting everything including all your team points%warning%) by quitting your team!

kick.colead: %error%You must be a Leader/Co-Leader to kick a player from your team!
kick.notlow: %error%You can only kick team members with lower rank than you!
kick.done: %success%Player %target% has been kicked out of your team.

invite.notsenior: %error%You must be in a team and be a %em%Senior-Member%error%, a %em%Leader%error% or a %em%Co-Leader%error% to invite a player!
invite.noplayer: %error%No player with such name is ever registered on our network.
invite.targetinteam: %warning%The target player is already in a team, but you can still invite him.
invite.accepttargetinteam: %error%The target player is already in a team. You can't accept his invitation.
invite.alreadysent: %error%Your team has already invited the target player.
invite.sameteam: %error%The target user is already in your team!

accepted.target: %notify%Your team join invitation to %em%%teamname%%notify% has been accepted!

invite.sent: %success%%name% has been invited into your team.

rankchange.senior: %error%You need to be at least a %em%Senior Member% in your team to promote/demote team members.
rankchange.promco: %error%There can only be one team leader!
rankchange.tohigh: %error%You can only promote/demote players of lower rank than you!

property.colead: %error%You must be at least a %em%Co-Leader%error% to change your team %type%!

config.colead: %error%You must be at least a %em%Co-Leader%error% to change your team %type%!

team.requested: %notify2%%name% sent a request to join your team!
team.kicked:
%notify2%You have been %italic%kicked out of your team %reset%%notify2%by %em%%src%%notify2%! %info%Reason:
%verbosemid%%msg%

enemy.target: %error%You cannot send a teleport request to your enemy (%em%%to%%error%)!

fail.dup: %error%You have already sent a request to teleport to %em%%to%%error%.
fail.spawn: %error%You can't teleport to someone at spawn!

to.received: %em%%from%%notify% sent a request to teleport to you! Do %em2%/tpa %from%%notify% to accept.
to.accepted: %success%Accepted request to teleport you to %em%%to%%success%. Teleportation will start in a few seconds. Hold the handrail!
to.beaccepted: %notify%Request to teleport %em%%from%%notify% to you has been accepted. Teleportation will take place in a few seconds. Don't stand near a cliff!

bf.from: %success%You are going to be teleported to your best friend, %em%%to%%success%, in a few seconds. Got your souvenir ready?
bf.to: %notify%Your best friend, %em%%from%%notify%, is going to teleport to you. Make a banner to welcome him!

fail.dup: %error%You have already sent a request to teleport %em%%to%%error% to you.

here.sent: %success%Sent a request to teleport %em%%to% to you.
here.received: %em%%from%%notify% sent a request to teleport you to him/her! Do %em2%/tp %from%%notify% to accept.
here.accepted: %success%Accepted request to teleport %em%%to%%success% to you. Teleportation will start in a few seconds. Don't stand near a cliff!
here.beaccepted: %notify%Request to teleport %em%%from%%notify% to you has been accepted. Teleportation will take place in a few seconds. Hold the handrail!

bf.from: %success%Your best friend, %em%%to%%success%, is going to teleport to you in a few seconds. Make a banner to welcome him!
bf.to: %notify%You are going to be teleport to your best friend, %em%%from%%notify%. Got your souvenir ready?

fail.offline: %em%%from%%error% left the server before teleportation takes place.
fail.enemynearby: %error%Could not teleport %em%%from%%error% to %em2%%to%%error% - enemy of %em%%from%%error%/%em2%%to%%error%, %em3%%enemy%%error% is nearby!

version.msg: %info%This server uses %em%%pmversion%%info% with %em2%%thetaversion%%info% by %em3%%thetaauthor%%info%. You are using %em%%lang% translation v%langversion%%info% by %em2%%langauthor%%info%.

firstjoin.hub:
%em%Walk into a portal%info% or %em2%Choose an item in your inventory%info% to join a game.
%info%You can also type %em3%/help%info% in chat to check for available commands.

ip.hist: matching an IP in the IP history

pass.prompt: %notify%Please login by typing your password into chat.
pass.mismatch:
%info%If you didn't register this account, please choose a new name.
%warning%The password you typed in isn't the one you registered with.
%warning%You have %chances% left.

register.prompt:
%info%Welcome to %bold%Legion PE%reset%!
%notify%Please register by typing your password %em%directly into chat.
%warning%You are disallowed from mentioning your password in chat, so remember not to use a common word as your password.
register.retype: %notify%Great! Now please type the password %em2%again%notify% to confirm it.
register.success:
%notify%Thanks for registering! You can use this password to login at anywhere on our network.
%verbose%Remember %bold%%em%never%reset%%verbosemid% to share your password to %em2%anybody%verbosemid%. Not even staff members.
register.mismatch:
%error%The two passwords aren't the same!
Let's start all over again.
%notify%Please type a password you like %em%directly%notify% into chat.

popup.login: %notify2%Please login by typing your password directly into chat.
popup.register: %notify2%Please register by typing your password directly into chat.

notification.main:
%notify2%%bold%~~~~~~~~~~ ATTENTION ~~~~~~~~~~
%em%%issuer%%warning% sent you a warning!
%verbose%Message:
%em2%%message%
%notify%This warning carries %em3%%points%%notify% warning points.
%info%You now have %em%%totalpoints%%info% warning points in total.
notification.muted:
%error%You have been muted by %em2%%issuer% %em3%%passed%%error% before. The mute ends in %em%%left%.
%verbose%Email %em2%support@legionpvp.eu%verbosemid% if you believe that this is a mistake.
notification.banned:
%error%You will be banned for %length%
%info%Send an email to %em2%support@legionpvp.eu%info% if you believe that this is a mistake.

toolong.online: You have been online for more than 90 minutes. Take a rest! I bet your device must be pretty hot.
toolong.login:
Have you registered here using this username?
Please choose another username if you don't.

kick.serverstop:
%notify2%Server restart. Please reconnect.
%verbosemid%Sorry for the inconvenience.

kits.reloading: %wait%Please wait while we are reloading your kits.
kits.reloaded: %success%Your kits have been reloaded. Do /kill to activate (counts one death).

death.lava: %error%You tried to swim in lava to escape from %killer%!

fall.generic: %error%You were %em%%action% to a deadly fall%error% by %killer%!
fall.ladder: %error%You were %em%%action% to a deadly fall%error% off %em2%a ladder%error% by %killer%!
fall.vine: %error%You were %em%%action% to a deadly fall%error% off %em2%vines%error% by %killer%!

kill.lava: %success%%em%%victim%%success% tried to swim in lava to escape from you!

attack.spawn: %verbose%You may not attack players at spawn!
attack.ffahint: %info%%ffa% activated friendly fire, so %source% can attack %target%.

stats.private: %error%%name% limited the access of his stats to his acquaintances! Do %em%/acq %plainname%%error% to send an acquaintance request.

feather.tut: %bold%Tap feather in hotbar to adjust sprinting.
